title: Phantom Samurai - Action Music Collection
description: A curated collection of 8 high-paced cyberpunk-inspired action music tracks. Envisioned at the crossroads of traditional samurai culture and the edgy aesthetics of cyberpunk realms.
longDescription:
Dive deep into the neon-lit streets and electric vibes of the future with "Phantom Samurai", a curated collection of 8 high-paced cyberpunk-inspired action music tracks. Envisioned at the crossroads of traditional samurai culture and the edgy aesthetics of cyberpunk realms, these tracks pulsate with energy and intrigue.


Features:

﻿

  • Versatile Playback Options: Both looped and unlooped versions available, catering to a diverse range of media needs. Whether it's a never-ending ride through a cybernetic city or a succinct montage, the tracks adapt flawlessly.
  • Purpose-Built for Creators: Precision-engineered for game developers and content creators. Immerse your players in a dystopian world or electrify your content with tracks that resonate with futuristic undertones.
  • A Fusion of Styles: Experience the intense collision of ancient samurai rhythms and the synthetic beats of cyberpunk. It's a symphony of contrasts that creates an unparalleled auditory experience.
  • Royalty-Free Licensing: Secure your purchase and gain unhindered access to use the tracks across your projects, free from future charges.


"Phantom Samurai" is more than just music. It's the heartbeat of a world where blade meets circuit, tradition clashes with technology, and every note transports your audience into the heart of a neon-infused saga. Give your project the sonic edge it deserves with this unparalleled collection. Perfect for visionaries eager to make a bold statement in the world of content creation.


--


Contains 2 Bonus Tracks
